mapper.select: SELECT MED_INFO_ID , MED_NM , DOSE_PERIOD , DOSE_START_DATE , DOSE_END_DATE , USER_ID , DEL_YN , REG_DT FROM TB_MEDICATION_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

SELECT LOGS.MED_LOG_ID , LOGS.MED_INFO_ID , LOGS.DOSE_DT , LOGS.USER_ID , LOGS.REG_DT , INFO.MED_NM , INFO.DOSE_PERIOD , INFO.DOSE_START_DATE , INFO.DOSE_END_DATE FROM TB_MEDICATION_LOGS LOGS LEFT JOIN TB_MEDICATION_INFO INFO ON LOGS.MED_INFO_ID = INFO.MED_INFO_ID WHERE LOGS.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY LOGS.REG_DT DESC
